item.title: Generation showdown – Generation Z pulling ahead
item.description: ██████████ Generation Z: 1375507 pts ████████ Millennial: 1103239 pts ██████ Generation X: 863047 pts Δ to next: 272268 pts Fun fact: Gen Z is the first generation to grow up fully mobile-first.

item.title: Birth-city boost – Rajahmundry on top
item.description: ██████████ Rajahmundry: 163849 pts ████████ Mangalore: 144413 pts ████████ Nellore: 142837 pts ████████ Davanagere: 138597 pts Δ to next: 19436 pts Fun fact: Rajahmundry has produced many artists and professionals.

item.title: Living-city rivalry – Tukwila leads the scoreboard
item.description: ██████████ Tukwila: 195790 pts █████████ Seattle: 187446 pts █████████ Everett: 181056 pts █████████ Newcastle: 179571 pts Δ to next: 8344 pts Fun fact: Tukwila is an active hub for the players in this game.

item.title: Combo chemistry – Erode → Seattle is the hottest route
item.description: ██████████ Erode → Seattle: 42844 pts ████████ Mumbai → Seattle: 37571 pts ███████ Kakinada → Everett: 33111 pts ███████ Warangal → Shoreline: 30081 pts Δ to next: 5273 pts Fun fact: Players born in Erode show strong mobility.

item.title: Demographic trend tracker & playful projection
item.description: █████ → ████ → ███ → ████ Generation Z (Round 1:385708 | Round 2:381113 | Round 3:232524 | Round 4:376162) Δ last:143638 proj:519800 Fun fact: Gen Z is the first generation to grow up fully mobile-first. █████ → ████ → ███ → ████ Millennial (Round 1:314145 | Round 2:304626 | Round 3:179672 | Round 4:304796) Δ last:125124 proj:429920 Fun fact: Millennials grew up during the rise of the internet and social media. ████ → █████ → ███ → ████ Generation X (Round 1:239512 | Round 2:243337 | Round 3:138843 | Round 4:241355) Δ last:102512 proj:343867
